Hello!
I am Janča Klímová 28yo and this is my online resume

About

I am an experienced full-stack web app developer focusing on highly comfortable user experience, maintainability, efficiency and maximal code reuse.

I've been doing the web stuff for over 15 years now, 12 years commercially, so not only I know the new stuff buzzing right now, but I've been doing the job when IE 6 and PHP 4 were around and Chrome was not a thing yet.

I can make small websites with the same ease as I am able to develop and deploy feature-heavy content management systems and other complex applications. I enjoy building bigger apps more though as it is usually more challenging.

I have experience with both Windows and Linux stacks, using popular technologies like PHP, C#, Python, MySQL, Apache, nginx, IIS, ASP.NET, Drupal, WordPress, etc. and also not-so-popular ones like TAL, ZODB, Plone, Nest, Pug, PHPTAL.

Recently I have been swimming in Node.js waters and I like it very much. I fell in love with TypeScript and would like to not have to write vanilla JS directly anymore.

Timeline

1991

Born in a small Czech town called Aš

In Aš I attended local elementary and later a grammar school (gymnasium).
2002

Started learning web development (in PHP)

At that time I was developing localy on my computer my first web pages using WAMP stack.

It looked awfull, were not doing much, but it was an early start! Other kids were playing Mafia while I was trying to figure out how to play music on my website for example.

Also, I moved from Aš to Karlovy Vary a year later in 2003.
2006

ATICOM2006 - 2013

I've started working part-time for 4 to 6 hours every day including weekends, since I was attending high school and a university later on.

What I did back then were various kinds of web projects using ZOPE / Plone CMS ranging from small company websites, over intranet document management systems, to public web applications including an e-shop.

Notable project: iRevis demo

2012

Entrepreneur / Freelancer (Python)2012 - 2014

For a little while I tried being an entrepreneur. Didn't work very well for me.
2014

myWAC2014 - 2015

Development of ERP / CRM / HRM software in Classic ASP (VBscript) and Transact-SQL.

More about myWAC on official site

2015

MULTIMA2015 - 2016

Development of web-based solutions mainly in ASP.NET (C#) and Transact-SQL.

I've also gained some basic Android development XP there.
2016

Entrepreneur / Freelancer (PHP)

…again it's not really working for me.
2017

Safetica Technologies2017 - present

Development of frontend (and backend) of an ASP.NET (C#) single page application.

Utilized technologies include: TypeScript + JavaScript, SASS, jQuery, KendoUI, ASP.NET and more…
